Info.Title: Flags of Our Fathers
Info.Writer: William Broyles Jr. (screenplay), Paul Haggis (screenplay), James Bradley (book), Ron Powers (book)
Info.Actors: Ryan Phillippe, Jesse Bradford, Adam Beach, John Benjamin Hickey
Info.Plot: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 25 nominations.
